room_title: Escape room "Mansion Murder" by Escapology Portage in Portage
room_description: During a family gathering, a scream fills the airâ€¦ Your Grandfather is found dead in the library - and it looks like murder! You're being framed and must await trial. The police will arrive in 60 minutes. The only evidence you might be able to use to clear your name is hidden in the Mansion... Can you piece the story together to prove your innocence?
